thread.title: DNC Chair refuses to mention Bernie Sanders by name when questioned about debate
thread.title_full: DNC Chair refuses to mention Bernie Sanders by name when questioned about debate - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: DNC Chair refuses to mention Bernie Sanders by name when questioned about debate
text: The first Democratic debate is just one day away, and all eyes will be on the inevitable confrontation between front runner Hillary Clinton and Sen. Bernie Sanders. Many Democrats have called for increasing the number of debates, and the DNC Chairwoman was pressed on the issue over the weekend. Photo by Mark Wilson/Getty Images
